## Packages used

The **Tidyverse** package installs a number of other packages for reading data:  

•  [httr](https://github.com/r-lib/httr) for web APIs.  
•  [rvest](https://github.com/tidyverse/rvest) for web scraping.  

[jsonlite](https://github.com/jeroen/jsonlite) for reading JSON data. 

[rtweet](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rtweet/vignettes/intro.html) for accessing Twitter's REST and stream APIs.
